course.subject: CIVL
course.name: Environmental Systems Analysis
course.description: This course introduces principles of systems analysis for the planning and management of the environment. Modeling, optimization and economic analysis methods are applied to problems of water and air quality, solid waste management, and renewable energy. Simple to complex case studies are used to present concepts of single- and multi-objective optimization, Pareto efficiency, and sensitivity analysis within the context of environmental quality control at local and regional scales.
course.prerequisites: CENG 1700 OR CIVL 1140 OR CIVL 2410 OR ENVR 2010
